 â”‚                                                                                                                    
 â”‚ # ZeroUI Help                                                                                                      
 â”‚                                                                                                                    
 â”‚   ZeroUI is a zero-configuration UI toolkit manager that simplifies managing UI configurations, themes, and        
 â”‚   settings across development tools.                                                                               
 â”‚                                                                                                                    
 â”‚   ## Quick Start                                                                                                   
 â”‚                                                                                                                    
 â”‚   â€¢ **Navigate**: Use arrow keys or hjkl (vim-style)                                                             
 â”‚   â€¢ **Select**: Press Enter to configure an application                                                          
 â”‚   â€¢ **Search**: Press / to search for applications                                                               
 â”‚   â€¢ **Filter**: Press 'a' to toggle between all/installed apps                                                   
 â”‚   â€¢ **Help**: Press ? to toggle this help system                                                                 
 â”‚   â€¢ **Quit**: Press q or Ctrl+C to exit                                                                          
 â”‚                                                                                                                    
 â”‚   ## Features                                                                                                      
 â”‚                                                                                                                    
 â”‚   â€¢ ğŸ”§ **Zero Configuration**: Works out of the box                                                            
 â”‚   â€¢ ğŸ¨ **Theme Management**: Consistent themes across tools                                                    
 â”‚   â€¢ âš¡ **Fast Performance**: Optimized for speed                                                                
 â”‚   â€¢ ğŸ” **Smart Search**: Find apps quickly                                                                     
 â”‚   â€¢ ğŸ’… **Beautiful UI**: Modern terminal interface                                                             
 â”‚                                                                                                                    
 â”‚ â†â†’/hl: Navigate pages â€¢ 1-5: Jump to page â€¢ ?: Close help
